alert.note: Alert for Faulk; Hand; Hyde; Potter (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 10:23PM MDT until July 03 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hand County in central South Dakota... Northeastern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Southwestern Faulk County in north central South Dakota... Eastern Potter County in north central South Dakota... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burkmere, or 11 miles west of Faulkton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Orient and Polo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
